title: Ian Blackford – 2022 Comments on Stephen Flynn Becoming SNP Leader at Westminster
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ian Blackford, the outgoing SNP Leader at Westminster, on Twitter on 6 December 2022.
content: Congratulations to Stephen Flynn on being elected the SNP Westminster leader. I look forward to supporting Stephen as he takes on the responsibility of taking the group forward as we work to deliver independence.
